subtitle: Share your knowledge and experience with our thriving Uzbek Developers Community in Korea. We're looking for passionate speakers who can inspire creativity and foster collaboration.

formFields.topics: Topic(s) you would like to cover *
formFields.topicsPlaceholder: Please describe specific themes or topics you would like to cover in our meetups

whyBecomeSpeaker.title: Why Become a KO'DJ Speaker?
reasons: Share your knowledge and expertise with a passionate community of developers
Network with other professionals and expand your connections in the tech industry
Enhance your public speaking skills and build your personal brand
Contribute to the growth of Uzbekistan's tech ecosystem
Be part of a movement to elevate the developer community to new heights
whyBecomeSpeaker.conclusion: We strongly believe that the best way to learn is by doing, and by becoming a speaker, you're helping others gain hands-on experience and practical knowledge they can apply in real-world scenarios.

successModal.title: Registration Successful
successModal.message: Your registration has been submitted successfully.
successModal.footer: We look forward to see you.

validation.fullNameMinLength: Full name must be at least 6 characters

validation.topicsMinLength: Your topic description should be at least 10 characters
